Quickstrike:





Quickstrike suddenly paused in the corridors of the Predacon base. He was 
hungry again. He had no idea on how long he was asleep. He thought briefly 
that Rattrap could wait for his torment. Something told him that he was the 
one that told Hell Beast that he mendled with the ship's computer. Not only 
that. He wasn't finished.

He grinned to himself as he passed the confinement chamber and cut into 
another hallway. On the way down, he saw Shredder.

"Hey," he called out. "There ya are." He approached him. "Where were ya? 
What's th' matter, get lost?" He chuckled.
